title: Will there be a sale?
body:
Yesteryear bundle = 737 RP. (I already have the vayne skin)
That includes 2 champions, 2 skins and a ward skin.

ONE of the skins in that bundle costs 975 RP. {{champion:22}} 

Will the Ashe go on sale for 50%? Or do I need to buy the bundle and get that rubbish ward skin I don't even want?

replies.body: It's not to go on sale and it's already a good deal for 737 Rp, stop whining
